children.name: out_num
children.desc: 实际出库数量（须乘以1000传入，如：现实中出库数量为5，则须传5000）

children.name: unit_cost
children.desc: 商品成本价（须乘以100传入）

requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 来源参数（需调用方自定义标识：OPEN_XXXX）

responseParams.name: response
responseParams.desc: 成功生成的出库单据号

struct.name: response
struct.desc: 成功生成的出库单据号

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['retail_source']="test"
params['remark']="测试配送出库"
params['items']="[{"out_num":3000,"sku_id": 7219116,"unit_cost":8000}]"
params['biz_bill_no']="SCS180813164732052427"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.stock.delivery.out', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'test', 'remark' => '测试配送出库', 'items' => '[{"out_num":3000,"sku_id": 7219116,"unit_cost":8000}]', 'biz_bill_no' => 'SCS180813164732052427', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
